title: Give them a chance: mission to no-man's land
creator_credit: Rank Film Productions, BBC, Stanley Wright and Georges Pessis
brief_description: Filmed during the World refugee year appeal, Yul Brynner reports on the refugee problem facing the world ten years after World War II. People still live in these refugee camps all over the world, being denied citizenship over and over again. Some are interviewed and convey the overwhelming frustration of years of trying to seek some sort of stabilty.
